CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 1, 1961, pg. 22, reads: 'YMCA League Champions - The above Mt. Ararat team won the championship playoffs of the Centre Avenue Branch YMCA Church Basketball League. Left to right, first row, are: Harry Slaughter (9), Eugene Bailey (13), Fletcher Hardy (7), Virgil Haley (10), Isaac Underwood (5), and Eugene Haley, coach.  Second row: Alvin Lawson, assistant coach, and star of the Westinghouse High School team.  Mr. Lawson played for the Mr. Ararat team last year, during the Centre Avenue Branch YMCA's 1959-'60 Church Basketball League.  He had a scoring average of 26.5 for the Mt. Ararat team during the 1959-'60 season. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mt. Ararat basketball players, from left: Harry Slaughter, Eugene "Timbo" Bailey, Alvin Lawson (rear), Fletcher "Fletch" Hardy, Virgil Haley, Isaac Underwood, and Eugene Haley, posed in in gym
